file_options.name: File options
file_options.description: Files needed to build the genome.

additional_fasta.name: Additional FASTA
additional_fasta.description: FASTA file to concatenate to genome FASTA file e.g. containing spike-in sequences.

gencode.name: Is Gencode
gencode.description: If your GTF file is in GENCODE format and you would like to run Salmon i.e. `--pseudo_aligner salmon`, you will need to provide this parameter in order to build the Salmon index appropriately.

featurecounts_group_type.name: Feature counts group type
featurecounts_group_type.description: If additional fasta file is provided and gencode is false, then this is the biotype value to use when appending entries to GTF file

outputs.name: Gene BED annotation
outputs.description: An annotation of the genome's genes, generated from the GTF.

outputs.name: Transcripts Fasta
outputs.description: A subset of the genome's overall fasta containing transcript sequences only.

outputs.name: STAR Index
outputs.description: A genome index which STAR can align reads to.

outputs.name: RSEM Index
outputs.description: A genome index which RSEM can align reads to.

outputs.name: Salmon Index
outputs.description: A genome index which Salmon can align reads to.

outputs.name: HISAT2 Index
outputs.description: A genome index which HISAT2 can align reads to.

outputs.name: HISAT2 Splicesites
outputs.description: A genome index which HISAT2 can align reads to.
